numbered_ace_sentences: 1. Indonesia had the highest percentage of people who said that the world is getting better.
2. Brazil had the lowest percentage of people who said that the world is getting better.
3. Mali had the lowest percentage of people who said that the world is getting better.
4. More people who are 15 years old to 24 years old said that the world is getting better than people who are more than 40 years old.
5. I wonder if the percentage in Mali is low because of the area where people in Mali live.
6. I wonder if the percentage in Brazil is low because of the area where people in Brazil live.
7. I think that the area where people live influences their decisions.
9. Knowing what people from other countries think is very important.
10. Knowing what people of other ages think is very important.
11. The header is: New Generation vs Old Generation.
